title: $200M lost to hacks in 2024, Shido token plummets 94%: Finance Redefined
description:
Over $200 million worth of cryptocurrency has been lost to hacks and rug pulls in 32 individual incidents so far this year.

Welcome to Finance Redefined, your weekly dose of essential decentralized finance (DeFi) insights — a newsletter crafted to bring you the most significant developments from the past week.

In a fireside chat at ETHDenver, United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Commissioner Hester Pierce advocated for more decentralization and said centralization means that “you have concentrated risks.”

An attacker took control of the Shido blockchain’s Ethereum staking contract and transferred out billions of Shido (SHIDO) tokens, according to PeckShield.

Read more

title: Crypto startups raise $485 million in February
description: Venture capital (VC) funds invested $485 million in crypto startups in February, according to DefiLlama data.

title: Crypto King Returns: Bitcoin’s dominance hits 2-month high
description: Bitcoin dominance, a metric indicating Bitcoin’s market share relative to other cryptocurrencies, has surged to a two-month high amidst a cooling-off period in the crypto markets following substantial gains. This rise reflects a growing preference for Bitcoin over alternative cryptocurrencies (altcoins).  The surge in Bitcoin dominance, reaching almost 50%, suggests increased investor confidence in Bitcoin […]

title: Solana (SOL) Tycoon Buys 500x Cryptocurrency Option2Trade (O2T) Before It Hits Stage 3
description: A Solana (SOL) tycoon has invested in the promising cryptocurrency, Option2Trade (O2T), before it progresses to stage 3 of its launch. This strategic move signals emerging opportunities in the cryptocurrency ecosystem, setting a new precedent for investors to be cautious and anticipate the potential success of Option2Trade (O2T), highlighting the market’s anticipation. title: New York Bank Facing Potential Collapse After Revealing $2,400,000,000 in Losses, Citing ‘Material Weakness’ in Risk Management
description:
A New York bank with $113.9 billion in assets is on the brink after revealing its balance sheet is far worse than investors already knew. New York Community Bank (NYCB) initially triggered fears of a wider banking crisis when Moody’s downgraded its credit rating last month due to “multi-faceted financial, risk-management and governance challenges.” Now, […]
